document.full_text: former world number one maria sharapova sounded out a warning to her rivals on tuesday after demolishing fellow russian ekaterina makarova 6-1 6-1 in 54 minutes to advance to the third round of the italian open.
document.title: ruthless sharapova storms into last 16
lines_and_colors: former world number one maria sharapova sounded out a warning to her rivals on tuesday after demolishing fellow russian ekaterina makarova 6-1 6-1 in 54 minutes to advance to the third round of the italian open.
